Esplorio: Travel journal & Blog for iPhone and Web

How we made it easy for anyone to record, share and discover travel adventures

Posted Aug 30, 2019

It‚Äôs a travel journal with a difference: Esplorio tracks your location as you travel without rinsing your battery - in order to generate accurate map of your trip. It works on planes, trains and automobiles and most importantly jet skis and quad bikes. Who doesn‚Äôt want their jet ski adventures to be tracked!

Not only Esplorio makes it easy for you to blog about your adventures, it also connects to your social media accounts to automatically identify anything with location-based information on it. Using all these info Esplorio generates a map showing exactly where you went and where you did your various intresting things.

Team

Although we were based out of Oxford and London in the United Kingdom, Esplorio was international company. I got the chance to work with great people across the world including the US, Thailand, Indonesia, Slovakia and Nigeria.

We were a small but talented team. Every single one of us got the makers attitude at heart. We started with a big vision of building a delightful product that can change the way travellers record their adventures. As a result of that we got 30000+ lovely users in less than 3 years.

Lovely faces behind Esplorio

My work at Esplorio

Alongside lead designer @Hasanga Abeyaratne, I got the chance to work on so many different product improvements that had great impact on both users and business. Some of which are

‚Ä¢ Strategising and introducing PRO subscription modal to grow and evolve Esplorio
‚Ä¢ Simplifing the overloaded Add trip flow which lead ~20% of users to drop off before creating a trip
‚Ä¢ Simplifying the navigation and Information Architecture (IA) of the web app, which had become cluttered and inconsistent over the previous 2 years
‚Ä¢ Optimizing the web app for consumption rather than content creation
‚Ä¢ Improving photo curation flow
‚Ä¢ Improving sign up and onboarding to cater different types of users
‚Ä¢ Making it easy for anyone to discover travel adventures with Esplorio explore
‚Ä¢ Initiating and building a Design System for Esplorio Web

ü•∞ Love is all around

Ô£øApple <3 Esplorio! Esplorio was not only featured as App of the day on App Store but also got featured on ‚ÄúTravel apps‚Äù category numerous time in so many countries.

Featured in Apple App Store

In just 3 years Esplorio reached the milestone of 30000+ MAU (monthly active users) and everyday, #goodstuff channel on slack is overwhelmed with positive notes and love letters from our lovely users. These love letters we receive from users are a testiment to the great product that we built.

Love letters from our lovely users

It‚Äôs always amaizing to see the hard work you put in turned to be a delightful product loved by thousands of people. Glad I got to experience the joy of building great products by working on Esplorio and it also helped me discover the makers attitude that was hidden inside me.
